title: 10,000x Return—When My Disciple Reaches Foundation Establishment, I Instantly Ascend to Immortality
author: Unknown
synopsis:
Zhong Qing transmigrated into a cultivation world and spent five years as a talentless waste on Mufu Peak, the most desolate of Xianjiang Sect's seven peaks. His only inheritance from his late master, Daoist Nai, was the Peak Master title and a daily check-in system that rewarded everything except cultivation—Saint-grade methods he burned for warmth, divine weapons he used as kitchen tools.

Then the system finally activates a new feature: the Trash Bond. By taking disciples who are complete wastes like himself, his disciples gain 100x cultivation speed while he receives 10,000x returns. When his first disciple cultivates for a day, Zhong Qing gains the equivalent of nearly 300 years of cultivation.

The sect that looked down on him, the Peak Masters who mocked him, and the geniuses who dismissed him are about to discover that Mufu Peak's 'trash' has been hiding a mountain of treasures all along.

chapter_titles.1: This Pile of Saint-Grade Cultivation Methods Should Last Me Through the Winter
chapter_titles.4: He... Wasn't He Supposed to Be Trash? How Did He...
chapter_titles.5: You Trash Think You're Qualified to Join My Mufu Peak?
chapter_titles.6: Imperial-Grade Cultivation Methods... By the Sackful?
chapter_titles.7: We Were Too Disrespectful Before—Quick, Kneel!
chapter_titles.8: Don't Think About Anything—Just Open the Method and Cultivate!
chapter_titles.9: You Think an Eighth-Grade Toy Can Compete With Us?
chapter_titles.10: A Pond You Can Never Escape
chapter_titles.11: Gaining Enlightenment in the Bitter Sea
chapter_titles.16: Never Let Anyone Who's Hurt You Get Away
chapter_titles.18: Mufu Peak's Master Defending Himself—Perfectly Reasonable
chapter_titles.20: The Sect Owes Zhong Qing an Apology
chapter_titles.24: Shameless Flattery Taken to the Extreme
chapter_titles.26: Nothing Is Harder Than Being an Ordinary Person
chapter_titles.28: The System's Reward—Right to the Heart
